entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 07:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -25.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
